sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Heading, Input, Button, FormControl, FormLabel, Switch, Avatar, useColorMode, useColorModeValue, FormHelperText, InputGroup, InputRightElement, InputLeftElement, Link, Box, background, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import './sign.css' import { EmailIcon,ViewOffIcon,ViewIcon} from '@chakra-ui/icons' const Sign = () => { const { toggleColorMode } = useColorMode(); const formBackground = useColorModeValue('gray.300','gray.700'); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const handleShowClick = () => setShowPassword(!showPassword); return ( Бүртгүүлэх Цахим хаяг } /> Нэвтрэх нэр } /> Нууц үг } /> нууц үгээ мартсан? {/* Enable Dark Mode? */} Бүртгүүлсэн?{" "} Нэвтрэх ) } export default Sign
